reviewText: I think this anime is wonderful ! Upbeat, light hearted and adorable ! Jessica Nigri does a good voice over, considering this is her first anime. The Japanese voice actresses, especially Ayano Yamamoto, do a great job. If you are into the light hearted, upbeat, adorable animes that convey Japanese culture in these thems then this is for you ! There is alittle fan service if that is your thing as well.
Awesome

I love jessica, but she really does need some work on her voice acting. I bought this and was really surprised at how bad she is at the voice acting. Everyone else is wonderful and it's a great show. But I think they probably should have chose someone else for Sonico.
took past the 2 days on prime but still a great light hearted anime. Great distraction from the Bernie and Hillary babble going on
I love super sonico and I love Jessica so this is great!!

I liked this series for what it was, a lighthearted, easygoing watch. Not too deep, though there were some episodes that made me think. No nudity or anything too sexual in nature (boo, Sonico is basically a sex symbol...). The artwork and animation are top notch, though the story is somewhat mediocre. I will say that Sonico dresses up as one of my favorite other characters in one episode (Kirisu Makise) and that was pretty awesome. A good buy if you're into her, the artwork alone is justification to buy if you can appreciate it.
This is more of a question but do i have to have an all region dvd player bcuz i rlly wanna buy this
A great show! Sonico is so awesome words cannot describe. Buy it for the good of of humanity! Tell your friends the good news! Spread the Sonico love!
Love it! Jessica Nigri did a great job with the dub :)
I love Super Sonico and this animation is awesome!!! Both in English and Japanese!!!
I was surprised at how well Jessica did at voice acting Super Sonico. I love this anime, and she definitely did it justice!
I love Jessica Nigri and I love Super Sonico.

I actually think the english dub added to the experience. There's more life to it, verses the Japanese version, which was good, but it was also a little dull by comparison. But that's just me. True, this is Jessica Nigri's first anime role, but I think she does a pretty good job. I'd like to here more from her.
This is good I recommend.
Very inspiring, especially considering that I'm a musician myself. There is some fan service when it comes to Sonico's part time job but her innocent character tames those aspects.
I love Jessica nigri and I love this amine! You will too.
Great show just love jessica nigri
bought by son who enjoys this
Thank-you so much I loved it ^_^
Enjoyable! Helps to be a Sonico and anime fan first though....lol

While this is a lively anime, with fan service (especially Soni Ani), I couldn't give it 5 stars. Soni is very busy, although not the brightest girl. It's a fun anime, but there's no real ending. If you can get it at a deal, I say go for it. But don't expect too much for a story line. I did enjoy it, but I also didn't pay top dollar.

I love sonico and the show. But honestly I like the Japanese version better. Her voice went more with the character and her personality. Nigiri is cool and she does okay but I guess it's just not all there for me. She needs a little more practice.
Very fun series of shorts stories based upon a fun character.
